item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, April 25, 2025 at 4:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Writing "/etc/hosts" breaks the Substack editor (203 points | 112 comments)
2. FBI arrests Wisconsin judge on charges of obstructing immigrant arrest (298 points | 118 comments)
3. Eurorack Knob Idea (104 points | 40 comments)
4. New LLM jailbreak bypasses all major FMs (66 points | 38 comments)
5. Tumor-derived erythropoietin acts as immunosuppressive switch in cancer immunity (12 points | discuss)
6. I made a college punching bag for rejected highschoolers (20 points | 7 comments)
7. A Love Letter to People Who Believe in People (127 points | 31 comments)
8. Notation as a Tool of Thought (1979) (257 points | 56 comments)
9. Exploiting Undefined Behavior in C/C++ Programs: The Performance Impact [pdf] (31 points | 5 comments)
10. "Poetry City": Iowa City, Iowa (9 points | 1 comment)
11. What If We Could Rebuild Kafka from Scratch? (126 points | 121 comments)
12. The $20k American-made electric pickup with no paint, no stereo, no screen (213 points | 195 comments)
13. Scientists Develop Artificial Leaf, Uses Sunlight to Produce Valuable Chemicals (222 points | 101 comments)
14. Show HN: BugStalker - a modern Rust debugger (44 points | 4 comments)
15. I wrote to the address in the GPLv2 license notice (2022) (730 points | 533 comments)
16. OpenAI releases image generation in the API (452 points | 263 comments)
17. Tarpit ideas: What are tarpit ideas and how to avoid them (2023) [video] (112 points | 123 comments)
18. A Visual Journey Through Async Rust (106 points | 18 comments)
19. GCC, the GNU Compiler Collection 15.1 released (119 points | 88 comments)
20. OpenVSX, which VSCode forks rely on for extensions, down for 24 hours (230 points | 126 comments)
21. Ask HN: Share your AI prompt that stumps every model (349 points | 576 comments)
22. Century-old genetics mystery of Mendel's peas solved (9 points | 6 comments)
23. Show HN: Logiquiz – Daily Self-Referential Puzzles (23 points | 12 comments)
24. Instant SQL for results as you type in DuckDB UI (350 points | 114 comments)
25. One quantum transition makes light at 21 cm (239 points | 149 comments)
26. Avoiding Skill Atrophy in the Age of AI (181 points | 181 comments)
27. You Can Be a Great Designer and Be Completely Unknown (225 points | 105 comments)
28. Show HN: Lemon Slice Live – Have a video call with a transformer model (171 points | 73 comments)
29. PyGraph: Robust Compiler Support for CUDA Graphs in PyTorch (73 points | 7 comments)
30. Show HN: Faasta – A self-hosted Serverless platform for WASM-wasi-HTTP in Rust (71 points | 27 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, April 25, 2025 at 4:20 PM UTC
